cbs.label: Cybernetic Broadcasting System
cbs.plot: Cybernetic Broadcasting System dominates our galaxy for over a decade. This is the main audio stream from Intergalactic FM. You can run all you want, but there is no escaping CBS.

df.label: IFM Disco Fetish
df.plot: This stream is Intergalactic FM's audio channel called Disco Fetish. Here you will find the galaxy's best of Disco, Italo and Electro
